location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to George Skipp, at Shiraz

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for copies of the grants given to the Company by Sadoo Caun [SƒÅdiq Khan Zand] in July 1763. Complaints are made about the Sheikhs of Bushire's refusal to attest to the fidelity of the copies and how they are generally being uncooperative.
